title: 'Barbie' faces DC's 'Blue Beetle' in a late summer box office showdown
description: Warner Bros. Discovery's "Blue Beetle" arrives in cinemas this weekend and is expected to tally between $22 million and $32 million domestically.

title: Elon Musk says users on X, formerly Twitter, will lose ability to block unwanted followers, eliminating key safety feature
description: Elon Musk said on Friday that users of the site formerly known as Twitter will no longer be able to block unwanted followers from responding to their posts.

title: Bitcoin breaks below $26,000, heads for worst week since November
description: Bitcoin is down more than 11.5% this week and on pace for its seventh weekly loss in the past eight, and its worst week since mid-May.

title: Disney goes on offense in DeSantis board's lawsuit, seeks damages for breach of contract
description: DeSantis recently told CNBC that he has "moved on" from the feud with Disney, which stemmed from a clash over the bill dubbed "Don't Say Gay" by critics.

title: Automakers are finally embracing lidar sensors. A few startups look like market-share winners
description: After years of talk — and a SPAC boom in the sensor sector — automakers have finally started incorporating lidar units into their vehicles.

title: New Covid vaccines from Pfizer, Moderna and Novavax will likely protect against Eris variant
description: The drugmakers designed their updated coronavirus shots to target the omicron subvariant XBB.1.5, which is slowly declining nationwide.

title: Stock markets face a 'perfect storm' as high rates and China fears bite, analysts warn
description: Stock markets were hit with a "perfect storm" this week as concerns about a Chinese economic slowdown and persistently higher U.S. interest rates rattled global sentiment.

title: Xpeng shares drop 6% as the Chinese electric carmaker reports mounting losses
description: The Chinese electric carmaker's troubles continued with Friday results showing a wider-than-expected loss in the second quarter.

title: Hong Kong's benchmark Hang Seng index closes in bear market territory
Sea pivoted to growth over profits as it faced rising competition from TikTok, Lazada, analysts say
description: Just months ago, Sea overhauled its business to focus on profitability amid high inflation and interest rates.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Treasury yields are putting pressure on stocks
description: Rising U.S. Treasury yields are straining stocks. And with rates possibly going higher if inflation resurges, yields could climb further still.

title: China's central bank steps up intervention after yuan hits 16-year low against greenback
description: This is second straight day that the fixing rate has been above 1000 points stronger than consensus forecasts

title: China's property giant Evergrande files for bankruptcy protection in Manhattan court
description: The world's most indebted property developer defaulted in 2021 and announced an offshore debt restructuring program in March.

title: Maui emergency chief resigns after defending decision to not activate sirens during wildfire
description: Andaya was asked Wednesday whether he regretted not activating emergency sirens as wildfires spread across West Maui: "I do not," he said at press conference

title: China's property troubles aren't getting better, intensifying calls for bolder policy help
description: Prospective home buyers are holding back on making purchases, leading to weak sales that compound the urgent need for policymakers to step up support for the industry.

title: China's growing aggression will be in focus as U.S. closes ranks with Japan and South Korea
description: The summit will be the first standalone meeting between them as the U.S. seeks to capitalize on improving ties between its closest security alliances in Asia.

title: What China's big earnings say about the consumer
description: Corporate earnings releases are picking up on a few bright spots for China's consumer in a competitive market where people are less willing to spend.
